scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes religious debates (especially Catholicism), immediate family, trips, housing, both women's writing and poetry, deteriorating health, Frank Murphy, presidents, other officials (including McCarthy and Romney), Jacqueline Kennedy's trip to India, Willow Run, The Dollmaker, vacations, ACLU activities, the press, and family stories earlier in their lives.
